forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with mostly cloudy conditions overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with mostly cloudy conditions overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain or snow showers in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers diminishing in the morning. A few breaks in the clouds in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
